snippet: A man, who was working for Alpha General Contractor of New York, fell through an area where planks had been removed onto scaffolding at the Dream New York hotel on West 55th Street, officials said.
abstract: Construction worker dies after fall at Dream New York hotel in Midtown Manhattan; unidentified man, who was working for Alpha General Contractor of New York, fell about 80 feet through area where planks had been removed onto scaffolding.
lead_paragraph: A man, who was working for Alpha General Contractor of New York, fell through an area where planks had been removed onto scaffolding at the Dream New York hotel on West 55th Street, officials said.

headline.main: Worker Is Killed in Fall at a Midtown Hotel
headline.print_headline: Worker Is Killed in Fall at a Midtown Hotel
